posts.post_content:
If anybody here won this lot in the recent Heritage auction, I would be interested in giving you a decent profit should you be willing to sell.  Thanks.

[url]https://sports.ha.com/itm/baseball/c-1880s-black-baseball-sterocard-lot-of-3/a/152003-43330.s?ic4=GalleryView-Thumbnail-071515#[/url]

There used to be (maybe still is) a record / equipment store that all the bands would do in-store appearances in Rochester at call "House of Guitars", I wonder if that's part of why they chose their name?

Doug
I believe The House of Guitars still exists.  Don't know about the name.
